Pre-Game Insights: Colombia might not have qualified for the 2022 World Cup, but the CONMEBOL side has done everything since to make up for the devastating failure.
Others: Colombia look to extend their 23-game unbeaten run as Los Cafeteros take on Paraguay at Copa America 2024 on June 24.
Paraguay have not beaten Los Cafeteros since 2017.
Colombia are the dark horses at Copa America 2024.
